n_147.title: Retail Sale Associate
n_147.cmpname: Hard Rock Café Ho Chi Minh City

db.title: Trưởng nhóm
db.skill: • Able to communicate complex information to individuals and groups, make presentations and respond to questions in workplace settings. Skills developed in degree program and during work experience. • Able to give and take instructions and maintain active listening during times of pressure. • Comprehensive knowledge of Microsoft applications including Word, Power Point, Photoshop, Corel draw • Fluent in English (both oral and written) • Confident and ambitious for personal goal • Service, team and detailed-oriented • Highly motivated and willing to work in a dynamic and competitive environment. • Punctual, reliable, diligent, honest • Adaptable and organized
db.keyword: Giao tiếp hiệu quả,Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng,Tập trung trong công việc,Chịu được áp lực công việc,Trung thực,Tự tin,Nhiệt tình,Tinh thần làm việc nhóm,Tinh thần trách nhiệm
